pr_title: 6528 seven zip initialization to core installer

timeline.message: seven zip initialization to core installer
seven zip initialization to core installer

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think loadDynLibraries() is the best spot for this. Everything else in this method is being loaded with a call to System.loadLibrary().
Also, putting it here means it only happens on Windows. Is that intentional?
I would recommend putting this into it's own method (like we do for JavaFX and Jython) and adding a comment on why this is being done in the installer.
timeline.author: esaunders

timeline.bodyText: How about an explanation as to why this is being done in the installer?
timeline.author: esaunders
